messages.content: You are a professional summarizer. Provide clear, concise summaries.

{text}

{content}

{content}

{content}

Write an engaging introduction for a document about {topic}. Context: {context}

Write the main content section for a document about {topic}. Context: {context}. Make it informative and well-organized.

Write a conclusion for a document about {topic}. Context: {context}. Summarize key insights and provide a forward-looking perspective.
